wblut.geom

Interface WB_Surface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WB_BezierSurface, WB_BSplineSurface, WB_RBezierSurface, WB_RBSplineSurface, WB_SurfaceBlend

    public interface WB_Surface
    Interface for parameterized surfaces.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte, W:Blut
